branchCategory.name: PPA, Handheld Manometer, for Portable Pressure Measurement
branchCategory.description: <p>PPA is a handheld pressure measuring device, also known as a manometer.  Optional pressure ranges include high and low pressure, or vacuum.  Simple controls include a power button and a back light for viewing the display in dark locations.  The meter is battery operated and shuts off automatically after 5 minutes without use.  Connect to a pressurized system with the attached one-touch fitting.  Display can show instantaneous pressure, or hold the peak or bottom pressure during the connection.  PPA manometers are CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP40 enclosure rating.</p>

breadCrumb.name: PPA, Handheld Manometer, for Portable Pressure Measurement
